attributes.action: Equally compensate the elderly and disabled for having to 'slop out'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is a proposal to grant prisoners financial compensation for the indignity and inconvenience of having to 'slop out' each day. While we do not object to prisoners gaining decent toilet facilities we strongly insist that any financial compensation be also granted to the elderly and disabled, and their carers, who slop out their commodes, bed pans, urinals, etc. every day 'without' complaint.
